FILE: cm325620v11.0.txt
DYAD: ITALY - LIBYA
RIVALRY: RIV859
DISPUTE(S): MID2965 


PSNOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180809
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180809


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID2965 

TERRMID: MID2965 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2965 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2965 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2965 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2965 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2965 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2965 from Gibler 2018, Libya arrested two Italian fishermen that Libya claimed were in its territorial waters. Italy protested. Coded not maritime because there was no maritime border dispute present. 

ISLMID: MID2965 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2965 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2965 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2965 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2965 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2965 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2965 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2965 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2965 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2965 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
